#      – Path to where the CMake modules are located
#      CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX
#      – Where to put files when calling 'make install'
#      CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE
#      – Type of build (Debug, Release, ...)
#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

# Configure therush

set(HEADER_FILES 
  targetver.h
)

set(SOURCE_FILES 
  therush.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********

add_executable(
    therush
    ${ALL_FILES}
)
find_library(MINIBALL_LIBRARY miniball PATHS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../libs)
find_library(TINYXML_LIBRARY tinyxml PATHS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../libs)
find_library(RAKNET_LIBRARY RakNet PATHS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../libs)
if (NOT MINIBALL_LIBRARY)
message(FATAL_ERROR "MiniBall not found !")
endif (NOT MINIBALL_LIBRARY)
if (NOT TINYXML_LIBRARY)
message(FATAL_ERROR "TinyXML not found !")
endif (NOT TINYXML_LIBRARY)
if (NOT RAKNET_LIBRARY)
message(FATAL_ERROR "RakNet not found !")
endif (NOT RAKNET_LIBRARY)

message(${RAKNET_LIBRARY})

target_link_libraries(
    therush
    edit
    game
    platform
    render
    world
    base
    LinearMath
    GIMPACTUtils
    BulletCollision
    BulletMultiThreaded
    pthread
    CEGUIBase
    CEGUIOpenGLRenderer
    CEGUITinyXMLParser
    ${TINYXML_LIBRARY}
    ${MINIBALL_LIBRARY}
    ${RAKNET_LIBRARY}
    fmodex
    Cg
    CgGL
    SDL
)
